articles.title: Big Tech and Momentum Stocks Fall Victim to Coronavirus Fears - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Apple, Microsoft, Tesla and others drop sharply as investors react to news of fresh outbreaks outside China
articles.content:
The stock markets biggest darlings are no longer immune to the coronavirus.

articles.title: Drugmaker Moderna Delivers First Coronavirus Vaccine for Human Testing
articles.description: Clinical trial is expected to start in April, as epidemic originating in China spurs quick response
articles.content:
Drugmaker Moderna Inc. has shipped the first batch of its rapidly developed coronavirus vaccine to U.S. government researchers, who will launch the first human tests of whether the shot could help suppress the epidemic originating in China.
